function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Perceived threat leading to non-adoption of protective health measures","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread, higher infection rates, and more severe health outcomes","Mitigation":"Educational campaigns, access to accurate information, and clear communication of risks","Technologies":"Health communication platforms, social media monitoring, and information dissemination tools","People":"General public, at-risk populations, individuals with low health literacy","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Cognitive overload from excessive information on social media","Impact":"Reduced ability to process health-related information, misinformation propagation, and decreased adoption of protective health measures","Mitigation":"Filtering and fact-checking tools, education on critical thinking and information evaluation, creating reliable and concise health content","Technologies":"AI-powered content analysis tools, social media monitoring algorithms, health information verification platforms","People":"Social media users, individuals seeking health information, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Tech companies, social media platforms, health organizations"},{"Description":"Limited processing capability leading to difficulty in acquiring health knowledge","Impact":"Decreased understanding of health information, challenges in behavior change, and suboptimal health decision-making","Mitigation":"Simplified health communication, interactive and engaging educational materials, personalized health information delivery","Technologies":"Interactive health apps, personalized health platforms, gamified health education tools","People":"General public, individuals with low health literacy, marginalized communities","Owner":"Health organizations, educational institutions, public health authorities"}]}
